FUNCTION.NAME: COBJECT
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Creates and returns a new CObject Instance.

FUNCTION.NAME: FRAC
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Creates a fraction given either a numerator and denominator or a decimal value.

PARAMETER.NAME: Numerator
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Numerator of the fraction. If this is a decimal value, a acceptable whole number will be found with a denominator less than or equal to the denominator passed.

PARAMETER.NAME: Denominator
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Denominator of the fraction. If the passed Numerator is a decimal value, however, this will represent the highest allowable denominator for the fraction to find.

FUNCTION.NAME: SIN
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Sine of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Sine is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: COS
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Cosine of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Cosine is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: TAN
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Tangent of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Tangent is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: SEC
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Secant of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Secant is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: ASIN
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the ArcSine of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose ArcSine is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: ACOS
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the ArcCosine of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose ArcCosine is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: ATN
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the ArcTangent of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose ArcTangent is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: ASEC
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the ArcSecant of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose ArcSecant is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: HSIN
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Hyperbolic Sine of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Hyperbolic Sine is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: HCOS
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the hyperbolic Cosine of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Hyperbolic Cosine is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: HTAN
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Hyperbolic Tangent of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Hyperbolic Tangent is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: HASIN
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Hyperbolic ArcSine of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Hyperbolic ArcSine is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: HACOS
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the hyperbolic ArcCosine of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Hyperbolic ArcCosine is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: HATN
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Hyperbolic ArcTangent of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose Hyperbolic ArcTangent is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: HASEC
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Hyperbolic ArcSecant of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: NUMBER
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number whose hyperbolic ArcSecant is to be calculated.

FUNCTION.NAME: SEQ
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Creates a array containing a sequence of values using an expression, variable to change within the aforementioned expression, an initial value, a end value, and an optional Step.

PARAMETER.NAME: Expression
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Expression used to create the sequence each iteration.

PARAMETER.NAME: Varname
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Variable name to cycle from Start to end. Generally, this is found within the Expression argument.

PARAMETER.NAME: Start
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Starting value for 'Varname' argument.

PARAMETER.NAME: End
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Ending value for 'Varname' argument.

PARAMETER.NAME: Step
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: number used to increment 'Varname' after each iteration. if not provided, defaults to

FUNCTION.NAME: SEQEX
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Creates a List of values with the given parameters, which include a initial value, and expression to perform, the name of the variable to increment, the expression used to change the variable, and an expression that, when true, will terminate calculations.

PARAMETER.NAME: Expression
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Expression that operates on the given variable name for each iteration.

PARAMETER.NAME: VarName
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Name of the variable to use.

PARAMETER.NAME: InitialValue
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Initial value to assign to VarName

PARAMETER.NAME: IncrementExpression
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Expression executed each loop and whose result will be assigned to the given variable name.

PARAMETER.NAME: TerminateExpression
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Expression executed each loop. If the return is non-zero (true) the loop is terminated and so are further calculations. The current result will be returned at that point.

FUNCTION.NAME: ABS
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the absolute value of a number.

PARAMETER.NAME: Value
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Value whose absolute value is to be returned.

FUNCTION.NAME: ARRAY
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Given a list of arguments, returns a Array whose elements correspond to the passed parameters.

PARAMETER.NAME: Elements
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: a number of parameters corresponding to elements in the array.

FUNCTION.NAME: ASC
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the ASCII code of the first character in the passed string.

FUNCTION.NAME: CHOOSE
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns a value from a selection of items depending on the value of the first argument.

PARAMETER.NAME: INDEX
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Value used to index into the following arguments.

PARAMETER.NAME: Choosables
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Array of items indexed into by 'Number' to return the appropriate value.

FUNCTION.NAME: CHR
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: given the ASCII number, returns that character.

FUNCTION.NAME: CREATEOBJECT
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Creates a Object given it's programmatic Identifier (ProgID)

PARAMETER.NAME: ProgID
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: ProgID of the object to create.

FUNCTION.NAME: CVERR
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Converts a number to a variant of subtype Error.

FUNCTION.NAME: DATEADD
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Adds a given Number of Intervals to Date.

PARAMETER.NAME: Interval
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Interval to add to Date. (yyyy=Year,q=Quarter,m=Month,y=Day of Year,d=Day,w=weekday,WW=Week,h=Hour,n=Minute,s=Second)

PARAMETER.NAME: Amount
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Number of Intervals to add to Date.

PARAMETER.NAME: Date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Date to add intervals to.

FUNCTION.NAME: DATEDIFF
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the difference between two dates in the given unit of time.

PARAMETER.NAME: Interval
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Unit of time to return the difference in.

PARAMETER.NAME: Date1
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: older date to compare to Date2

PARAMETER.NAME: Date2
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: More recent date then Date1

PARAMETER.NAME: FirstDayOfWeek
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: First day of week to use in the calculation.

FUNCTION.NAME: DATEPART
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns a specified component of the given date.

PARAMETER.NAME: Interval
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Portion of the date to retrieve.

PARAMETER.NAME: Date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Date to parse.

FUNCTION.NAME: DATESERIAL
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Converts a Month,Day, and Year Parameter into a Date Variable.

PARAMETER.NAME: Year
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Year of the Date to create.

PARAMETER.NAME: Month
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Month of the Date to create. If Month Exceeds 12, the returned date will be within the following year(s)

PARAMETER.NAME: Day
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Day of the Date to create. If Day exceeds the number of days in the month of the returned date, then the month is incremented. If this increment causes Month to Exceed 12, the date will go into the following year.

PARAMETER.NAME: Date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: String to convert to a Date.

PARAMETER.NAME: Date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Date whose Year is to be calculated.

PARAMETER.NAME: Date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Date whose Month is to be calculated.

PARAMETER.NAME: Date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Date whose Day is to be calculated.

PARAMETER.NAME: Date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Date whose Minute is to be calculated.

PARAMETER.NAME: Date
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Date whose Second is to be calculated.

PARAMETER.NAME: Cost
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Value specifying initial cost of asset.

PARAMETER.NAME: Salvage
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Value specifying value of asset at the end of it's useful life.

PARAMETER.NAME: life
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Value specifying length of useful life of asset.

PARAMETER.NAME: Period
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Value specifying period for which asset depreciation is calculated.

PARAMETER.NAME: factor
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Variant specifying rate at which the balance declines. If omitted, 2 (double-declining method) is assumed.

PARAMETER.NAME: Index
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Name of environment variable or index into the environment table.

FUNCTION.NAME: ERROR
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Converts an Error Code into a Descriptive message

PARAMETER.NAME: ErrorCode
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Error Code of Message to retrieve.

FUNCTION.NAME: EXP
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the constant 'e' raised to a power.

PARAMETER.NAME: Exponent
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: exponent of e

FUNCTION.NAME: FORMAT
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Formats a given value using the specified format String.

PARAMETER.NAME: Value
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Value to Format

PARAMETER.NAME: FormatString
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Format String to apply to Value.

FUNCTION.NAME: HEX
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns a string representing the specified value in Hexadecimal.

PARAMETER.NAME: Value
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Number to convert to Hexadecimal.

FUNCTION.NAME: FLATTEN
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Converts elements of an array that are themselves arrays into elements of the parent array spliced at the location of the array element.

PARAMETER.NAME: ArrayVal
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Array to be flattened.

FUNCTION.NAME: LEFT
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the leftmost 'n' characters from StrFrom.

PARAMETER.NAME: StrFrom
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: String from which to extract characters.

PARAMETER.NAME: Length
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Numbers of Characters to Extract.

FUNCTION.NAME: RIGHT
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Returns the Rightmost 'n' characters from StrFrom.

PARAMETER.NAME: StrFrom
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: String from which to extract characters.

PARAMETER.NAME: Length
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Numbers of Characters to Extract.

FUNCTION.NAME: MID
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: Extracts 'length' characters from 'strfrom' at 'pos'. if length is not specified, the rest of the string will be returned.

PARAMETER.NAME: String
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: String from which to extract characters.

PARAMETER.NAME: Start
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Location within the string at which to extract characters.

PARAMETER.NAME: Length
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Length of the string to extract from the first argument. If this would extend past the end of the string or is missing, the rest of the string is returned.
